Amelia Blossom Pegram (3 October 1935 ma ọ bụ 1938),  makwaara dị ka Amelia Blossom House, bụ onye odee na onye na-eme ihe nkiri South Africa, onye malitere ndụ ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi ma bụrụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlereanya
Amụrụ ya na Wynberg, Cape Town,  nye Henry Bowman-Pegram na Evelyn Minnie West na na 3 Ọktọba, n'agbanyeghị na enwere nghọtahie n'afọ amụrụ ya
Pegram kọwara, sị: “A mụrụ m n’oge opupu ihe ubi, ọ bụkwa ya mere aha m ji bụrụ Blossom
Oge opupu ihe ubi na South Africa bụ Ọktọba
Enwere m akwụkwọ ikike ọmụmụ abụọ, nke ahụ na-ada ụdị ara, mana otu na-ekwu 'iri atọ na asatọ, nke ọzọ na-ekwu' ịrị atọ na ise
O sitere na ndekọ ndekọ na South Africa."

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1961 na Mahadum Cape Town  na BA na akụkọ ihe mere eme na Bekee, ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi mana n'afọ 1963 hapụrụ South Africa maka ebumnuche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, mechaa dozie London, England, ebe ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ụlọ akwụkwọ egwu na ihe nkiri Guildhall,  mechara mee ihe na ogbo, telivishọn, redio na ihe nkiri
N'afọ 1972 ọ kwagara United States, na-ebi ma na-akụzi na Fort Knox,  wee nweta akara ugo mmụta nna ukwu na Mahadum Louisville N'afọ 1977, na-ede akwụkwọ nta akụkọ ya na Dennis Brutus
Ebipụtala akụkọ dị mkpirikpi ya, uri na edemede ya n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ, n'etiti ha Staffrider, Presence Africaine, Callalloo, The Gar, na Essence, ọ gụwokwa ma mee uri ya na mba ụwa

Ọ bụ onye edemede nke ọtụtụ akwụkwọ, gụnyere Our Sun Will Rise: Poems from South Africa (1989), ma tinye ya na anthology Daughters of Africa, nke Margaret Busby (1992) deziri, na mkparịta ụka na Kentucky Writers II (2015)

Nkwenye na Pegram natara maka ọrụ ya gụnyere onyinye nyocha sitere na ntoala Kentucky maka ụmụ nwaanyị, ndị nkwanye ugwu Kwanzaa, Nwaanyị nke Afọ, Louisville Board of Alderman Literary Award, ntinye n'ime Pan African Writer Association, na Umu nwaanyị South Africa maka ihe nrite nka na edemede ụmụ nwanyị (SAWW)
